title: [FEATURE] Update SKColorType to latest to get _SRgb GPU surface support
body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**

Render with correct alpha blending into an _SRgb texture when the graphics device color space is set to linear.

**Describe the solution you'd like**

Update to latest Skia and update the `SKColorType` enum to include the new option `kSRGBA_8888_SkColorType`:
https://skia.googlesource.com/skia/+/0f7c10ef5681d5c739bcd8862c58d856fd663a0c

**Additional context**

Discussion on the skia forum:
https://groups.google.com/g/skia-discuss/c/gi_WWpnOJno/m/Jr8L1pYDBwAJ
